summary: HistoryPage.tsx was modified to include at least the first three updated Texhoma/Colt Mercer (2105) sections with new titles and narrative content, but the diff is truncated and does not provide enough evidence that all REQ-1/REQ-2 acceptance criteria (all eight sections I–VIII, exact required quote, tenets list in section VII, TOC + hash navigation behavior, and hero text updates) were fully implemented. Two additional non-requested files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json) were also modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: History page displays exactly eight sections labeled I–VIII with titles matching the provided headings, and each section body matches the user-provided narrative (including the quoted line and the tenets list under section VII).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff for HistoryPage.tsx is truncated and only shows sections I–III; there is no visible evidence of sections IV–VIII, the exact required quoted line, or the section VII tenets list.

missing_requirements.requirement: Table of Contents renders all eight updated section titles and clicking each entry smoothly scrolls to the correct section card; direct navigation via URL hash scrolls correctly as currently.
missing_requirements.reason: The truncated diff does not show the Table of Contents rendering, anchor click handlers, hashchange handling, or smooth scrolling logic, so maintaining/updating in-page navigation cannot be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the History page hero heading/subheading to align with the Texhoma-focused 2105 narrative while keeping the existing layout/styling.
missing_requirements.reason: The truncated diff only shows the historySections array content (sections I–III) and does not include the hero heading/subheading portion of the page.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/maintained a repository-wide frontend file summary document.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked for content updates in HistoryPage.tsx and explicitly focused on keeping navigation behavior intact; it did not request editing or adding meta documentation files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project state tracking JSON (new_feature_requests/status/summary metadata).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not request modifying any project tracking/state files; it only specified frontend content changes to HistoryPage.tsx.
